timeline.message: [RHPAM-2960] Case instance update fails with java.io.NotSerializableException: org.jbpm.services.task.persistence.JPATaskModelFactory for cases containing multiple SLAs

timeline.bodyText:
Current version is getting kruntime from pctx.getKnowledgeRuntime() method. So not really sure why we are now retrieving in a different way by using pctx.getWorkingMemory().getKnowledgeRuntime()?
If kruntime is not an instance of InternalWorkingMemory this will return a null and thus it might fail later on - this wasn't previous/current behavior.
Can you please clarify?
